name: gitbook-plugin-style
tagline: Add some variety to your text.
body: # gitbook-plugin-style Conveniently add inline styles with [nunjucks](https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/templating.html#filters) filter syntax. ## Example ``` {{ "example text" | style("color:red") }} ``` ### Output ```html example text ``` # API ## style(styleString, *id=undefined*, *class=undefined*) ### Positional Arguments #### styleString Type: `string` HTML inline style string ### Named Arguments #### id Type: `string` Additional id attribute. #### class Type: `string` Additional class attribute. # License [MIT license](https://github.com/zachary822/gitbook-plugin-style/blob/master/LICENSE)
